value:
$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|There it is—the treasure vault.$k$pI can sense my Aurr inside.$k$pQuickly, before Gullveig manages
to find us here.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Blush|Finally, my precious Aurr has
been returned to me...$k$pNow I can save all of you
precious children...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What do we need to do in order to
gain limitless power? How do we
use the Aurr?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Draw your weapon and present
it to me, $Nu.$k$p...Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Breidablik looks even sparklier
than usual somehow!$k$pWhen did those beads of light
appear? I missed it!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|I have given the summoner the
power wielded by the god of
the land.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|B-but you can only use that
power once, right?$k$pYou haven't done anything yet,
but the beads of light are there
already... I don't understand!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|The cycle must have already
been completed...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What does that mean?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Before, when we traveled into
the past with Seiðr...$k$pI heard Breidablik had been
lost, but Kvasir had returned
it to $Nu.$k$pWas it already infused with
Lady Nerþuz's power when
you got it back?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But...how would it have gotten
into the past in the first place?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|It is the weapon of some other
summoner from some other time—
a now-dead $Nu...$k$pAfter that summoner fell to
Gullveig, the weapon must have
traveled back along with Kvasir.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Then that would mean...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Lady Nerþuz bestowed her power
on Breidablik at some point...$k$pGullveig fought the summoner,
and the weapon followed Kvasir
back in time...$k$pThen Kvasir gave that same weapon
to our $Nu.$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|And now I will bestow my power
on this weapon—this weapon that
has already received my blessing.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$Fi1500|Again, it gains the land's power.$k$pIf this cycle has already looped
upon itself infinitely...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The power of Breidablik will be
without limit...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Which limitless power will emerge
victorious, I wonder...$k$pIf you are who I believe you to
be, $Nu...$k$pYou are the one among the infinite
summoners who may be able to
break the serpents' curse.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Now, point your weapon at Seiðr.$k$pJust trust me, and...fire!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|NNNYYYAAAHHH!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|Guh... Urghh...$k$p$EFace|What is this...feeling?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Within you is...the land's power.$k$pThe golden serpents within you
have been destroyed. For you, the
cycle has been broken.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|So Seiðr is going to be all right!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|No, sweet one... The golden
serpents still exist... In both the
past and the future.$k$pIf left alone, any one of them
would continue the cycle of
calamity and ruin.$k$pSeiðr...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Yes?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|You have the power to defeat the
golden serpents.$k$pYou must put a stop to your other
selves, Kvasir and Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All we have to do is remove the
curses that they're under, right?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Not quite, my precious child. It is
only Seiðr who has the power to
do what needs to be done.$k$p$EFace_Anger|You are the only one who can stop
them, Seiðr—and no matter how you
may wish, you cannot save them.$k$pTo stop Kvasir and Gullveig, you will
have to kill them, Seiðr.$k$p$Sbs1000|
